name: zx
description: Full-stack web framework for Zig. HTML syntax within your Zig code, just like JSX but for Zig!
readme:
# ZX A full-stack web framework for Zig. Write declarative UI components using familiar JSX patterns, transpiled to efficient Zig code. ZX combines the power and performance of Zig with the expressiveness of JSX, enabling you to build fast, type-safe web applications. **[Documentation →](https://ziex.dev/learn)** ## Installation ##### Linux/macOS ```bash curl -fsSL https://ziex.dev/install | bash ``` ##### Windows ```powershell powershell -c "irm ziex.dev/install.ps1 | iex" ``` ##### Installing Zig ```bash brew install zig # macOS winget install -e --id zig.zig # Windows ``` [_See for other platforms →_](https://ziglang.org/learn/getting-started/) ## Quick Example ```tsx site/pages/examples/overview.zx pub fn QuickExample(allocator: zx.Allocator) zx.Component { const is_loading = true; const chars = "Hello, ZX Dev!"; var i: usize = 0; return (
{if (is_loading) (

Loading...

) else (

Loaded

)}
{for (chars) |char| ({char})}
{for (users) |user| ( )}
{while (i < 10) : (i += 1) (

{i}

)}
); } fn Profile(allocator: zx.Allocator, user: User) zx.Component { return (

{user.name}

{user.age}

{switch (user.role) { .admin => (

Admin

), .member => (

Member

), }}
); } const UserRole = enum { admin, member }; const User = struct { name: []const u8, age: u32, role: UserRole }; const users = [_]User{ .{ .name = "John", .age = 20, .role = .admin }, .{ .name = "Jane", .age = 21, .role = .member }, }; const zx = @import("zx"); ``` ## Feature Checklist - [x] Server Side Rendering (SSR) - [ ] `on`event handler - [x] Streaming - [x] Static Site Generation (SSG) - [ ] `getStaticParams`, `getStaticProps` - [ ] Client Side Rendering (CSR) via WebAssembly (_WIP_) - [x] Virtual DOM and diffing - [x] Rendering only changed nodes - [x] `on`event handler - [ ] State managment - [ ] Hydration - [ ] Lifecycle hook - [x] Client Side Rendering (CSR) via React - [x] Routing - [x] File-system Routing - [x] Search Parameters - [x] Path Segments - [x] Components - [x] Control Flow - [x] `if` - [x] `if/else` - [x] `for` - [x] `switch` - [x] `while` - [x] nesting control flows - [x] error/optional captures in `while` and `if` - [x] Assets - [x] Copying - [x] Serving - [ ] Assets Optimization - [ ] Image - [x] CSS (via plugins such as Tailwind) - [x] JS/TS (via esbuild) - [x] HTML (optimized by default) - [ ] Middleware (_cancalled_) - [ ] Caching (configurable) - [ ] Component - [ ] Layout - [x] Page - [ ] Assets - [ ] API Route - [ ] Plugin (_Alpha_) - [x] Builtin TailwindCSS and Esbuild - [x] Command based plugin system - [ ] Source based plugin system - [ ] Context (configurable) - [ ] App - [ ] Layout - [ ] Page - [x] Component - [x] `error.zx` for default and per-route error page - [x] `notfound.zx` for default and per-route error page - [x] CLI - [x] `init` Project Template - [x] `transpile` Transpile .zx files to Zig source code - [x] `serve` Serve the project - [x] `dev` HMR or Rebuild on Change - [x] `fmt` Format the ZX source code - [x] `export` Generate static site assets - [x] `bundle` Bundle the ZX executable with public/assets and exe - [x] `version` Show the version of the ZX CLI - [x] `update` Update the version of ZX dependency - [x] `upgrade` Upgrade the version of ZX CLI - [ ] Platform - [x] Web Server - [x] Web Browser - [ ] iOS - [ ] Android - [ ] macOS - [ ] Windows #### Editor Support - ##### [VSCode](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nurulhudaapon.zx)/[VSCode Forks](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nurulhudaapon.zx) Extension - ##### [Neovim](/editors/neovim/) - ##### [Zed](/editors/zed/) ## Similar Projects ### Rust * [Leptos](https://github.com/leptos-rs/leptos) - Full-stack, isomorphic Rust web framework with fine-grained reactivity and JSX-like syntax * [Dioxus](https://github.com/DioxusLabs/dioxus) - Cross-platform GUI framework with React-like API, supporting web, desktop, mobile, and SSR * [Yew](https://github.com/yewstack/yew) - Rust / Wasm framework for creating reliable and efficient web applications with component-based architecture * [Sycamore](https://github.com/sycamore-rs/sycamore) - Reactive web framework with fine-grained reactivity and minimal bundle sizes * [Perseus](https://github.com/framesurge/perseus) - Full-stack framework built on Sycamore with SSR, SSG, and incremental regeneration ### Zig * [Jetzig](https://github.com/jetzig-framework/jetzig) - Zig web framework with MVC architecture, built-in ORM, and powerful templating * [ZTS](https://github.com/zigster64/zts) - Zig Templates made Simple, a templating system for Zig * [zmpl](https://github.com/jetzig-framework/zmpl) - Mode-based templating language that compiles to Zig functions at build time, used in Jetzig * [mustache-zig](https://github.com/batiati/mustache-zig) - Mustache template engine implementation in Zig * [etch](https://github.com/haze/etch) - Compile-time tuned templating engine focusing on speed and simplicity * [Zap](https://github.com/zigzap/zap) - High-performance backend framework in Zig * [http.zig](https://github.com/karlseguin/http.zig) - Low-level HTTP/1.1 server written entirely in Zig (_ZX_'s backend) * [tokamak](https://github.com/cztomsik/tokamak) - Server-side framework for Zig * [zig-router](https://github.com/Cloudef/zig-router) - Straightforward HTTP-like request routing library for Zig * [zig-webui](https://github.com/webui-dev/zig-webui/) - Zig library that allows using any web browser as a GUI * [Zine](https://github.com/kristoff-it/zine) - Fast, scalable, flexible static site generator (SSG) written in Zig * [Zinc](https://github.com/zon-dev/zinc/) - Web framework written in pure Zig with focus on high performance, usability, security, and extensibility * [zUI](https://github.com/thienpow/zui) - UI kit for Jetzig framework with reusable components and styles * [zig-pek](https://github.com/nektro/zig-pek) - Comptime HTML/XML parser and renderer in Zig * [zigomponent](https://zigomp.prjct.dev/) - HTML compoenents in pure zig ## Related Projects * [Codeberg Mirror](https://codeberg.org/nurulhudaapon/zx) - ZX repository mirror on Codeberg * [zx-vscode](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx-vscode) - Official VSCode/Cursor extension with syntax highlighting, LSP support, and auto-formatting * [ziex.dev](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/tree/main/site) - Official documentation site of ZX made using ZX. * [zx-example-portfolio](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx-example-portfolio) - Demo portfolio web application built with ZX * [thegates.dev](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/thegates.dev) - Example clone demonstrating ZX capabilities ## Contributing Contributions are welcome! Currently trying out ZX and reporting issues for edge cases and providing feedback are greatly appreciated.

releases.name: v0.1.0-dev.508
releases.body:
This is a developer preview of ZX; some features are still works in progress.
Update or install the ZX CLI using the following scripts.

## Installation

##### Linux/macOS
```bash
curl -fsSL https://ziex.dev/install | bash
```
##### Windows
```powershell
powershell -c "irm ziex.dev/install.ps1 | iex"
```

## Changelog

### v0.1.0-dev.508

#### Features
- feat(vscode): add tempalte literal syntax support [`10ce6a2`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/10ce6a240d3ef1c0f5ae169903a5324811f48d68)
- feat: spread operator for attribute [`9650bb2`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/9650bb2daa3043194d1a85a29a93a9b8cbbfcccb)
- feat: error and notfound page [`28e5eae`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/28e5eae6bfb2c896429d7a78fd533af80076ea89)
- feat: configurable methods [`c4f2bc5`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/c4f2bc56d57663afe00c85cafef9f15176314589)
- feat: failable page [`34bc13d`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/34bc13d4e6901e9d616c53d4e7b90842d361d8b2)
- feat: failable component [`70ba62b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/70ba62be2577759c371b0a517eaea5e91d904503)
- feat: template literal syntax for copmonent props [`d9d5703`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/d9d57031c9c301a4eb6ac32b702732cdf8b62fa1)
- feat: streaming using builtin async attribute [`16afb8d`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/16afb8d696ae7bac7dc99b112b35b38db60e0b9e)
- feat: component level caching [`8aba678`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/8aba678826ba6a51b758491eda64ad809c9a3d18)

#### Fixes
- fix: resolve prefixed space and forced multiline on zx_text (#34) [`8af83ad`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/8af83ad708851732ddd6b7c3423e382452482760)
- fix: 404.html generation in export [`0638901`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/063890133f2c6048fa4f45cb56b9cfdcb1ef690b)
- fix: rendering attribute and copy all files in site [`dfe5ca1`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/dfe5ca1ae5f8e6e532dbb8936fa446ec86d2910f)
- fix: always have GET method enabled for page [`da7a5ac`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/da7a5ac04a40698124baee48de1f12cb2d46df2b)
- fix: do not add event handler attribute [`9ec8318`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/9ec83180f20cced77761d1992d85b349429f549b)

#### Documentation
- docs: add link to section [`fefaf63`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/fefaf63c49c3ab803e104ca0395f6242ada341ec)
- docs: reformat all zx file [`5a1bb1e`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/5a1bb1ea89a7653d4692e275d22f5abf8d8bbb42)
- docs: remove test err return [`7109fdf`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/7109fdf70c1567206f3676963e3d909f80d19597)
- docs: fix cli docs ref [`6c7c36a`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/6c7c36a340ca3f1df9809474b39e015c8efbee00)
- docs: add proper linking from learn to ref [`569c0f7`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/569c0f799bd856a62aad159e05a50c38eab1f407)
- docs: add shorthand and spread docs [`cdf985a`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/cdf985a4a10089605a8da094ea442b11edb977a9)
- docs: fix example page layout [`58303be`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/58303befe14583f6842b7c72dbd493556ef1fce1)
- docs: import jsz from vendor [`ae96238`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/ae96238e7740e80251e48e1009a637fd26453714)
- docs: cleanup examples page [`be96ed6`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/be96ed648f5149da9e4ecef8d957f029a3ede3bb)
- docs: remove unused import [`31d5b2f`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/31d5b2fc83d663bf2fb90b66aa02366855b0acdd)
- docs: wip caching docs [`f3c22bc`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/f3c22bc943aeb94e16247cf3a512248a4d65f750)
- docs: add delete item in todo example [`d71742b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/d71742bc9dc1953d7b46c1e2e61d8dd78ea7d5c4)
- docs: lightspeed perf [`46685d9`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/46685d9e79029b22a01a86d37fb5d2d018c28490)
- docs: dark mode codeblock bg [`a575d00`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/a575d004996665255e981036076c1baa321e196c)

#### Miscellaneous
- refactor: remove rendering attribute related logic [`40075f8`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/40075f880cfcf6f6c5f1334224892a4ff2f38001)
- refactor: remove old wasm test proj [`feeddcd`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/feeddcd410062dae246266a3f3bc6756b789a11e)
- test: fix import path test [`74f923b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/74f923bdbb62cf9ebc9548ea3c235e2f47d80a16)
- wip: component event handler [`1a79921`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/1a79921ab8317fdc07f428def04df285122e6692)
- test: add test to check duplicate attr preservation [`f7c9e5e`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/f7c9e5ed0753562a4ada07b53b12e934910357de)
- refactor: remove {[var]:f} syntax support [`7c43ae9`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/7c43ae9749ea77db7cc0fea4352d319a888f563b)
- refactor: make options passable to cmp [`61c22c9`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/61c22c9228a927882b2a56a668af6456c2666508)
- wip: component level caching [`8ba9493`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/8ba949370631d22ec2bb6a9ff752c6af9148dfb5)
- wip: csr diffing with key [`79bb4d9`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/79bb4d9b518563e8da090f9741d62de25feb93d7)
- wip: cleanup vtree impl [`6d97481`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/6d974817c0c8c434933f72aa1b454eb5b6283aa4)
- test: update test expect [`f8057a6`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/f8057a615f5a63866f4c46ad1e33382c8214790b)
- chore: version bump [`296cea3`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/296cea3b7f22e0337c9b2b485bcc072c8352da48)
- chore: sync template [`7875255`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/78752556b18e66320dec28473268f3bed108b201)

### Contributors

- @Andrew-Velox
- @nurulhudaapon

releases.name: v0.1.0-dev.460
releases.body:
This is a developer preview of ZX; some features are still works in progress.
Update or install the ZX CLI using the following scripts.

## Installation

##### Linux/macOS
```bash
curl -fsSL https://ziex.dev/install | bash
```
##### Windows
```powershell
powershell -c "irm ziex.dev/install.ps1 | iex"
```

## Changelog

### v0.1.0-dev.460

#### Features
- feat: page level caching (#32) [`60e7d9b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/60e7d9b95d6544d9c7b085589728776eda076b2d)
- feat: introduce template string literal [`e220baf`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/e220bafdb4980d68b014b677032e1bf8952c6d22)
- feat: sourcemap flag for transpile [`f7dab67`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/f7dab6793c9e1839a79fd2ffdb75a2e0d87f7c78)
- feat(zx): introduce zx.ComponentContext & zx.ComponentCtx(type) [`7abdefe`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/7abdefef1ec942036e171bf69ff252cdc3557c1e)
- feat: class={class} shorthanded -> {class} [`1bac3c9`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/1bac3c94bdd6292cd35d685cf5273814a4e87eb9)
- feat: builtin attribute shorthand @{allocator} [`dd1179d`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/dd1179d1b722af6eb8ec4829c38a1f4e5d9f1f15)
- feat: enabld all http method in page [`a80f92e`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/a80f92e20098a4778db839f063707d8487eb6c0d)
- feat: add zx as step by default [`2e1f986`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/2e1f986825e61a4eff54a0bea603c29141d697b1)
- feat(editor): shorthand attribute syntax [`35f03b2`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/35f03b237c69917c5d6f80ff3aaf36cb44a09cad)
- feat: return zx.Build from zx.init [`a39be65`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/a39be65ea418d68a1f19d066198119b8123eee9a)
- feat: add manual installation process [`ea5f9df`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/ea5f9df6c5b8cae637acd47c47976a25d9393a72)

#### Fixes
- fix(fmt): expression_mixed spacing (#33) [`3bd6f0a`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/3bd6f0a9fdcc0856bd3ee12880f19d3c5f953e78)
- fix: temporarily remove expect check for plugin [`aabee50`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/aabee50c4eb1445e51b7eba1eaaa53e41c7f5565)
- fix: add missing cachez dep [`44a49ba`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/44a49ba49982a82ded81fb14a01e540848d87af9)

#### Documentation
- docs: improve expressions secction [`17478c0`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/17478c0132be63dade988fe475d0d1446a8d7f11)
- docs: proper example component name [`1dfeda2`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/1dfeda29c0ffec7556fb2f7d72250ff9f445fd8e)
- docs: support multi tabs in example_block [`9746780`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/9746780091af1c40aa0dddbc6fb90f36d77e9b67)
- docs: update expressions exmample [`ddafe4a`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/ddafe4acf3bcf7605e2ae985ab8929be8e13b4c7)
- docs: move the cli docs to ref page [`feb15b8`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/feb15b8653c5d383e28768e67ff08c4f74b714b7)
- docs: remove tree-sitter install step [`0728d05`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/0728d054afe655e04e07fc64453846f04945992b)
- docs: make scripts ts [`97c8a7f`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/97c8a7fed567c5f38141383f4f1dd90e51f92859)
- docs: bundle prettier for html formatting [`fe401bf`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/fe401bf0e01712e5d480f156eeb6f5c3256db3d6)
- docs: fix missing prettier dep [`7b70d09`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/7b70d097cab26c350e05faa1209266431540cfc2)

#### Miscellaneous
- test: add if_while_if test (#30) [`50682a4`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/50682a460e2f2b2a9dbd449e4399cc38a3211b6a)
- refactor: remove legacy transpiler (#31) [`7ce52f4`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/7ce52f4e84c1b6759071cfc9a92ae0cd406acfeb)
- chore: vendor zig-js [`977112b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/977112ba64abeff4f1be592db0c253196f727f1f)
- chore: vendor zig-tree-sitter [`97e0bb2`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/97e0bb2fe60a0d76dcd14e5717ce285df03201e3)
- chore: vendor zli [`da1238e`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/da1238eccf69e165a4efa2aa19181250541fece8)
- chore: cleanup vendors [`71ce876`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/71ce876b89b22dfa0fcd5a74b61bf42c636a6fe4)
- chore: further cleanup vendor [`b3a16c3`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/b3a16c3d6b66addda94b62d754d7995283a3f590)
- chore: version bump [`dc8a794`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/dc8a7941e7df22c6e485a007b28974694425ee4f)
- chore: version bump [`7dd90f8`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/7dd90f8b7c2731c17426996a8265846dc772db83)
- chore: use vendored zig-tree-sitter [`0657ee3`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/0657ee383af46579b978ca2423a35ef60b16ee98)
- chore: include link with changelog [`089eb56`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/089eb56fb1ea197b6679cd4d8b283a7fa244aca7)

### Contributors

- @Andrew-Velox
- @nurulhudaapon

releases.name: v0.1.0-dev.434
releases.body:
This is a developer preview of ZX; some features are still works in progress.
Update or install the ZX CLI using the following scripts.

## Installation

##### Linux/macOS
```bash
curl -fsSL https://ziex.dev/install | bash
```
##### Windows
```powershell
powershell -c "irm ziex.dev/install.ps1 | iex"
```

## Changelog

### v0.1.0-dev.434

#### Features
- feat: configurable tailwind/typescript plugin (#27) [`61c1737`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/61c1737eabd658b06d5efee59edadc9c99cd875c)
- feat(plugin): rename typescript to esbuild [`be227f2`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/be227f2e7dfd803b655a9182e89f6d7c1c2d7a84)
- feat: if error capture [`8e31514`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/8e315149eea405c488da637a02870b7dc1150f9f)
- feat: add while null and error capture [`c1adef8`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/c1adef89e1b7b223de5383e810c33ab0cb3a4f10)

#### Documentation
- docs: update leptos gh url (#28) [`53d2989`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/53d298929702af4d6f848af65ecfb64a546a6313)
- docs: add plugins doc [`d4e0057`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/d4e0057059a895352080555c14d5f75f7dee3eea)

#### Miscellaneous
- chore: version bump [`ed4410b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/ed4410b4280872e500796c8f9dd9de77b478ea5c)

### Contributors

- @elpekenin
- @nurulhudaapon

releases.name: v0.1.0-dev.427
releases.body:
This is a developer preview of ZX; some features are still works in progress.
Update or install the ZX CLI using the following scripts.

## Installation

##### Linux/macOS
```bash
curl -fsSL https://ziex.dev/install | bash
```
##### Windows
```powershell
powershell -c "irm ziex.dev/install.ps1 | iex"
```

## Changelog

### v0.1.0-dev.427

#### Features
- feat: add support to pass children to custom component [`73a57ef`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/73a57ef354dedc978075ee30fd44cf3c62245303)

releases.name: v0.1.0-dev.400
releases.body:
This is a developer preview of ZX; some features are still works in progress.
Update or install the ZX CLI using the following scripts.

## Installation

##### Linux/macOS
```bash
curl -fsSL https://ziex.dev/install | bash
```
##### Windows
```powershell
powershell -c "irm ziex.dev/install.ps1 | iex"
```

## Changelog

### v0.1.0-dev.400

#### Features
- feat(editors/vscode): add html hover and complete [`454ecdb`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/454ecdbd6644c1da2f5c4d97dfd39c82506afd18)
- feat(editors/vscode): add virtual file for .zx import resol [`bc3699b`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/bc3699bc24f2126501459863d767030f9c98e646)
- feat: get rid of special syntax requirement for format expression [`6f84e11`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/6f84e11ce26a258433d9224ca7ffb34cbebd3ed9)
- feat: decl of inline html block [`bf36013`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/bf360138a9989e1b87e9b8ed2e80c876ef17c7ee)
- feat: move away from prototyped transpiler [`5e30ebf`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/5e30ebf3a77afcdd39ccb5ff2ec09aa51eab3eb2)

#### Fixes

- fix: rendering float [`d95ce78`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/d95ce780ab7fd45d8be100ddc55aa67f1db0fe57)

- fix(fmt): free sourcez in cli [`190f49d`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/190f49dfd9806f697685c6eb093882cb205e775b)
- fix: nested switch_switch transpile [`d0e2e85`](https://github.com/nurulhudaapon/zx/commit/d0e2e85e762ae7bfa7c109b0e1048216c1c08392)

#### Documentation
